.method public static hidebysig void FinalizeTLogs(bool trackedOperationsSucceeded, class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] readTLogNames, class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] writeTLogNames, class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] trackedFilesToRemoveFromTLogs) cil managed

param.name: trackedOperationsSucceeded
param.span: True 指示跟踪的操作执行成功。

span.span: True indicates that tracked operations succeeded.
TLogs to be read.
TLogs to be written.

param.name: trackedFilesToRemoveFromTLogs
param.span: 要从 TLog 中移除的跟踪文件。

span.span: Tracked files to be removed from TLogs.

summary.span: 根据跟踪的执行是否成功来压缩和完成 Tlog。

span.span: Compact and finalize the Tlogs based on the success of the tracked execution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成跟踪操作后，我们需要根据跟踪的执行是否成功来精简/完成 Tlog。Once tracked operations have been completed then we need to compact / finalize the Tlogs based on the success of the tracked execution. 如果该操作失败，请清除 Tlog。If it fails, then we clean out the TLogs. 如果成功，我们将从 Tlog 中清理临时文件并重新编写它们。If it succeeds then we clean temporary files from the TLogs and re-write them.

summary.span: 根据 UpToDateCheckType，检查跟踪数据是否指示所有内容都是最新的。

span.span: Checks if the tracking data indicates that everything is up to date according to UpToDateCheckType.

returns.span: 如果所有内容均为最新的，则返回 ；否则，返回 。

span.span: if everything is up to date; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果内容不是最新的，则 Tlog 会进行压缩，以删除准备重新跟踪工作执行的所有条目。If things are not up to date, then the TLogs are compacted to remove all entries in preparation to re-track execution of work.

span.span: Gets or sets a switch that specifies whether root markers in the TLog be treated as file accesses, or only as markers.
